additionalInformation: Null Talisman automatically upgrades on the 25th-minute mark. For Turbo Mode, it automatically upgrades on the 12th-minute mark.
For Turbo Mode, it automatically upgrades on the 12th-minute mark.

The item's attributes grant the following bonuses: 44/88 health and 0.2/0.4 health regeneration. 60/120 mana and 0.25/0.5 mana regeneration. 2/4 attack speed and 0.33/0.67 main armor. 5/10 main attack damage to heroes, 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes, and 6/12 main attack damage to heroes.
5/10 main attack damage to heroes, 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes, and 6/12 main attack damage to heroes.
name: Null Talisman
description: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
trivia: Null Talisman was one of the best stat efficient items in the game, purchased by most heroes, before the introduction of Bracer and Wraith Band in version 6.00.
tips: For intelligence heroes, a Bracer grants almost as much attack damage as a Null Talisman.
